Trinity::

She tried to climb up onto Archarngle's back.  She dug her little 
claws in as she finally climed up onto his shoulder. "OK, Let's go 
have some fun!"  she giggled a little and had this big grin on her 
face. "And then we go find mom and dad after the fight right?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Sky Lynx/Arcangel/The 
Destrocons/Falcon/Snare/Jetstorm/Sharpedge:::
> 
> Sky Lynx: Fight? what fight?  is there a battle going on where i 
can offer my 
> services?  If so, im going there.  Where is this battle?
> Arcangel: its at the Ark.
> Sky Lynx:(amazed) the ark.
> Arcangel: I'll explain on the way.  Hop on kid.  Well, i dont know 
if well 
> see your parents there but.. theres a pssibility. If there not 
there well 
> look for them right after this battle ends.
> ::Sky Lynx takes of and heads to the ark::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Falcon, Snare, and The Destrocons jumped up::
> Falcon: Finally a chance to test our strength!
> ::The Destrocons fire 25 shots each at Cerberus, and Falcon and 
Snare both 
> fire 25 shots at Sphink::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Jetstorm gets hit by some of the shots and 1 missle.  he dodges 
most by 
> flying up really high.  he fires 25 rapid fire optic basts and 25 
energy 
> balsts at Reptilica.  A few shots hit his head::
> Sharpedge: Dammit!
> ::Mech fluid is leaking out.  Sharpedge fires 2 missles up at 
Bloodystrike::
